prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon that has a relaxed expression and a shell on its back.
Show me a Pokemon with pink skin and a unique shell accessory, perfect for a water environment.
Generate an image of a bipedal Pokemon with a sleepy demeanor, holding a large, spiky shell.
Imagine a Pokemon with a purple head and a laid-back personality, often found near the sea.
Design a Pokemon that looks like it enjoys lounging around, featuring a shell that resembles a natural weapon.
Give me a visual of a round-bodied Pokemon with a soft color palette and a distinct aquatic theme.
Make a Pokemon that embodies calmness and stillness, with a shell that adds to its unique character.
